item.title: [dmu] Goblin Picker
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

item.title: [dmu] Battlefly Swarm
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect

Flying

{B}: Battlefly Swarm gains deathtouch until end of turn.

item.title: [dmu] Hammerhand
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Hammerhand enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. (It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under your control.)

item.title: [dmu] Bone Splinters
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Destroy target creature.

item.title: [dmu] In Thrall to the Pit
item.description:
Sorcery

Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [dmu] Choking Miasma
item.description:
Sorcery

Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)

If this spell was kicked, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.

All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.title: [dmu] Keldon Strike Team
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W}} as you cast this spell.)

When Keldon Strike Team enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

As long as Keldon Strike Team entered the battlefield this turn, creatures you control have haste.

item.title: [dmu] The Cruelty of Gix
item.description:
Enchantment — Saga

Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)

I — Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.

II — Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life.

III — Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [dmu] Meria's Outrider
item.description:
Creature — Elf Archer

Reach

Domain—When Meria's Outrider enters the battlefield, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.

item.title: [dmu] Eerie Soultender
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

When Eerie Soultender enters the battlefield, mill three cards. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

{4}{B}, Exile Eerie Soultender from your graveyard: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [dmu] Gibbering Barricade
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Wall

Defender

{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

item.title: [dmu] Knight of Dusk's Shadow
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Your opponents can't gain life.

{1}{B}: Knight of Dusk's Shadow gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [dmu] Barkweave Crusher
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Warrior

Enlist (As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.)

item.title: [dmu] Phyrexian Vivisector
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Human

Whenever a creature you control dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [dmu] Bite Down
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

item.title: [dmu] Shadow Prophecy
item.description:
Instant

Domain — Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put up to two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [dmu] Broken Wings
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

item.title: [dmu] Splatter Goblin
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Goblin

When Splatter Goblin dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.title: [dmu] Deathbloom Gardener
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Deathtouch

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [dmu] Elfhame Wurm
item.description:
Creature — Wurm

Vigilance, trample

item.title: [dmu] Shadow-Rite Priest
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Other Clerics you control get +1/+1.

{3}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another Cleric: Search your library for a black creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

https://twitter.com/SpellTable/status/1562832422982516736

item.title: [dmu] Floriferous Vinewall
item.description:
Creature — Plant Wall

Defender

When Floriferous Vinewall enters the battlefield, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [dmu] Hexbane Tortoise
item.description:
Creature — Turtle

Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

Enlist (As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.)

item.title: [dmu] Baird, Argivian Recruiter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power greater than its base power, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

item.title: [dmu] Llanowar Stalker
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Llanowar Stalker gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [dmu] Ertai Resurrected
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Human Wizard

Flash

When Ertai Resurrected enters the battlefield, choose up to one —

• Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. Its controller draws a card.

• Destroy another target creature or planeswalker. Its controller draws a card.

item.title: [dmu] Jodah, the Unifier
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

Legendary creatures you control get +X/+X where X is the number of legendary creatures you control.

Whenever you cast a legendary spell from your hand, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a legendary nonland card with lesser mana value. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [dmu] Garna, Bloodfist of Keld
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Berserker

Whenever another creature you control dies, draw a card if it was attacking. Otherwise, Garna, Bloodfist of Keld deals 1 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [dmu] Meteorite
item.description:
Artifact

When Meteorite enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [dmu] Vanquisher's Axe
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0.

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [dmu] Ertai Resurrected
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Human Wizard

Flash

When Ertai Resurrected enters the battlefield, choose up to one —

• Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. Its controller draws a card.

• Destroy another target creature or planeswalker. Its controller draws a card.

item.title: [dmu] Radha, Coalition Warlord
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Warrior

Domain — Whenever Radha, Coalition Warlord becomes tapped, another target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

item.title: [dmu] Aron, Benalia's Ruin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Human

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

item.title: [dmu] Astor, Bearer of Blades
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

When Astor, Bearer of Blades enters the battlefield, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may reveal an Equipment or Vehicle card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Equipment you control have equip {1}.

Vehicles you control have crew 1.

item.title: [dmu] Baird, Argivian Recruiter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power greater than its base power, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

item.title: [dmu] Bortuk Bonerattle
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Troll Shaman

Domain — When Bortuk Bonerattle enters the battlefield, if you cast it, choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card to the battlefield if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

item.title: [dmu] Elas il-Kor, Sadistic Pilgrim
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Kor Cleric

Deathtouch

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

Whenever another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [dmu] Meria, Scholar of Antiquity
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Artificer

Tap an untapped nontoken artifact you control: Add {G}.

Tap two untapped nontoken artifacts you control: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

item.title: [dmu] Nael, Avizoa Aeronaut
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Scout

Flying

Domain — Whenever Nael, Avizoa Aeronaut deals combat damage to a player, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put up to one of them on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order. Then if there are five basic land types among lands you control, draw a card.

item.description:
Creature — Ape Shaman

Whenever you cast a creature spell, choose one —

• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

• Look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

• You gain 4 life.

Enchantment

Flash

When Prayer of Binding enters the battlefield, exile up to one target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Prayer of Binding leaves the battlefield. You gain 2 life.
